function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased transmission of COVID-19 in the EU/EEA and the UK","Impact":"Higher risk of infection for individuals in the community","Mitigation":"Infection prevention and control measures, social distancing, travel-related screenings","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Community members, travelers","Owner":"Health authorities, employers, individuals"},{"Description":"Lack of risk identification and assessment for COVID-19 in the workplace","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 transmission among workers","Mitigation":"Conducting risk identification and assessment, involving workers in the process, implementing long-term resilience at the workplace","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, communication platforms for worker involvement","People":"Workers, employers","Owner":"Employers, workplace safety authorities, health and safety professionals"},{"Description":"Absence of workplace guidelines for coping with COVID-19 community measures","Impact":"Increased risk of workplace transmission and inadequate response to community measures","Mitigation":"Developing industry-driven office workplace guidelines, implementing infection prevention and control measures, facilitating flexible working schedules and distance working","Technologies":"Virtual communication technology, workplace modification tools","People":"Workplace professionals, employees","Owner":"Real estate consulting firms, professional associations"}]}
